hanzi-su-wiki:
誤

Значения

Ошибаться, заблуждаться

Мнемоника

Страна, давшая 呉 язык 言. Считалось, что чтения иероглифов надо заимствовать из государства Го (провинция Цзян-су), но потом убедились, что это — не язык Китая, но лишь диалект, ошибочный язык.

Варианты

误
purpleculture_pinyin:
wù
mistake; error; to miss; to harm; to delay; to neglect; mistakenly
ошибка; ошибка; пропустить; повредить; отложить; пренебрегать; ошибочно
rtega_mnemonic:
誤誤RS
误误		err, make mistake, interfere
  • words 言 leading one into battle 呉/吴: a mistake
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 误)
Antonyms: 正
Pictophonetic: 吴 indicates the sound; 言 (speech) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
誤解 [ wù jiě ]: to misunderstand; to misread; misunderstanding
誤會 [ wù huì ]: to misunderstand; to mistake; misunderstanding; Classifiers: 个
誤區 [ wù qū ]: mistaken ideas; misconceptions; the error of one's ways
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 言 [ yán ] words, speech; to speak, to say
    • 吴 [ wú ] one of several warring states; surname
heisig_chinese_memo: It is a rookie error to believe the words when your sweetie says "You don't have to give me anything special, like the stairway to heaven, for my birthday." Trust me, your sweetie wants something, something shiny, and if you disappoint, you will suffer.
heisig_constituent: mistake, say, words, keitai, mouth, give, mouth, chair, tool, animal legs, mouth2
koohiiStory1: You must give words of apology when you make a mistake.
koohiiStory2: It is a rookie mistake to believe the words when your sweetie says "You don´t have to give me anything for my birthday." Trust me, your sweetie wants something, something shiny, and if you disappoint, you will suffer.
jp_example_words:
誤る(あやまる): to make a mistake
誤差(ごさ): error
誤魔化す(ごまかす): to deceive, to falsify, to misrepresent
錯誤(さくご): mistake
誤り(あやまり): error
誤解(ごかい): misunderstanding
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: They say accidentally firing a catapult is an unforgivable mistake. They say you shot the catapult at your own castle. Even though it was an accident, it’s still a mistake you will never be forgiven for.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine shooting the catapult on your own people by mistake. Hear the catapult whoosh as your heart drops into your stomach. Oh, what a terrible mistake you’ve just made.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This mistake alerts Godzilla (ご), who thinks it's town destroying time. He barrels over the hills, sees where you mistakenly catapulted your own people, and proceeds to stomp on the rest of it for you.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Picture Godzilla jumping happily on the castle and surrounding town you hit by mistake. This is probably the worst mistake you've ever made.
Ru_trainchinese:
wù: (глаг) пропускать, опаздывать; мешать, препятствовать
wù: (графема) ошибочный; ошибка; ошибочно
Kanshudo_mnemonic: words (言) can give (呉) errors
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: A common error is a friend with different taste in food telling you it will be like heaven in your mouth.
humanum_short_description_en: "Shuowen": "Mistaken, absurd. From Yan Wusheng." Basically, " mis " is regarded as a pictophonetic character. However, if you look at the construction and meaning of the word " Wu ", the word " mistaken " may also have an understanding. See " Wu ".
humanum_short_description: 《說文》：「誤，謬也。從言吳聲。」基本上把「誤」視為一形聲字。然而，如從「吳」字的構義著眼，「誤」字可能也有會意的成分。參見「吳」。

誤字的基本解释

誤
wù
见“误”。

誤字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wù］
［《廣韻》五故切，去暮，疑。］
亦作“悮1”。“误1”的繁体字。
(1)谬误；错误。
(2)耽误；妨害。
(3)迷惑。
(4)不是故意地；不慎。

誤字的康熙字典解释

【酉集上】【言字部】　誤； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页1163第20
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?五故切，音寤。【說文】謬也。【書·立政】其勿誤于庶獄庶愼。【傳】誤，失也。【禮·聘義】使者聘而誤，主君弗親饗食也。【註】誤，謂禮節錯誤也。【前漢·張耳傳】君何言之誤。【吳志·周瑜傳】瑜精音樂，雖三爵後，其閒缺誤，知之必顧。故時人謠曰：曲有誤，周郞顧。　又【字林】通作悞。惑也。【荀子·正論篇】是特姦人之誤于亂說，以欺愚者。

誤字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
誤字的起名意思

暂无。

error
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wù］
["Guangyun" five reasons cut, go to dusk, doubt. ]
Also known as "悮1". Traditional characters for "Error 1".
(1) Fallacy; error.
(2) Delay; nuisance.
(3) Confused.
(4) Not intentionally; carelessly.
error
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[You Ji 1] [Words Department] 　Error; Kangxi Strokes: 14; Page Number: Page 1163 No. 20
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Five reasons cut, sound 寤. [Said the text] Absurd. 【Book·Lizheng】It should not be mistaken for the concubine and concubine. [Biography] Mistakes, too. [Rite·Employment] If the messenger is hired by mistake, the lord will eat with himself. [Note] Mistakes mean that the etiquette is wrong. [Previous Han·Zhang Erzhuan] Jun He made a mistake. 【Wu Zhi·Zhou Yu Biography】Yu Jing music, although the three nobles, the lack of mistakes, knowing must be taken care of. Therefore, people’s rumors say: The song is wrong, Zhou Yungu.　[Zi Lin] All in all. Confused too. 【Xunzi · Zheng Lun Article】It is the wrongdoing of the traitor to fool the fool.

wù
вм. 误
Radicals: 言, 呉  (say, catapult)
Meaning Mnemonic
They say accidentally firing a catapult is an unforgivable mistake. They say you shot the catapult at your own castle. Even though it was an accident, it’s still a mistake you will never be forgiven for.
Imagine shooting the catapult on your own people by mistake. Hear the catapult whoosh as your heart drops into your stomach. Oh, what a terrible mistake you’ve just made.
Reading Mnemonic
This mistake alerts Godzilla (ご), who thinks it's town destroying time. He barrels over the hills, sees where you mistakenly catapulted your own people, and proceeds to stomp on the rest of it for you.
Picture Godzilla jumping happily on the castle and surrounding town you hit by mistake. This is probably the worst mistake you've ever made.
